Tel Megiddo National Park is on Route 66 between Megiddo Junction and Yokne'am Junction, about 2 kilometers northwest of Megiddo junction. Kibbutz Megiddo lies nearby.

Several buses running between Hadera and Afula stop at the Megiddo Junction. From here, Tel Megiddo is a short walk away to the north.

Megiddo is the site of biannual summer excavations
conducted by Tel Aviv University and a consortium of overseas institutions - volunteers are welcomed (fees apply for participation and college credit) on each campaign from all over the world.
